page.title: 19Interview with a ground crew
page.content: We talked to one of the{800 {ground crew staff}at R.N.A.S. who work in the{17 hangers}on{9 different types of plane.On average it takes one and a half hours to check a plane with a{6 {man crew,}but when something is wrong up to 10 men will work on the plane. Each man works a{40 hour week. Each plane is checked out every day before it flies and rechecked between each flight that same day.Occasionally a rescue service has to be mounted. The{worst accident}was 5 years ago when a German Star Fighter crashed. { Training}includes 3 months in a classroom, 3 months practical work on planes and a further 3 months for each type of plane you work on. When the planes{go to sea,}the ground crew go with them and this makes the job interesting. The worst part of the job is cleaning the plane!
